name: Better 9anime
description:
Updated 9anime style to hide many ads as possible to stop the site from ruining your experience while watching your favorite shows.

Feel free to edit or report any unstopped ads if you're able to report its ID or CLASS.
additional_info: Updated for January update of the website remake.
